page.title: 10Education
page.content: Ysgol Hiraddug was built in 1950 and has 8 classes, one for each year group. The Nursery 3+ has 27, I1-26, I2-32,I3-33,J1-28,J2-42,J3-31 and J4-30. A total of 249 children.There are 8 Teachers, 1 Head Teacher, 2 Nursery Assistants and 1 part time Teacher. Ysgol Melyd was opened in 1970 and has 7 classes. The part time Nursery has 21,and the 2 Infant classes 31 and 33.In the Junior classes there are J1-29,J2-25,J3-25 & J4-28 making a total of 192 children.There are 5 Teachers, a Nursery Assistant plus 5 part time Teachers and a Head Teacher. Children from both schools transfer to Prestatyn High School or the Catholic High School, Blessed Edward Jones in Rhyl.If they wish to be educated through Welsh they attend Ysgol Glan Clwyd, in St Asaph.
